section.title: Write the title action-orientated according to the target group.
section.para: If you want to make the user to do something use this section . Write a short introduction or if necessary a short summary for long instructions. A sentence mustn't be longer than 25 words. Use the same words for the same meaning, be consistent. Use as less specialist terms as possible according to the target group. An instruction can be linked to an example. If you need figures, use a caption. Observe the chronology.
